mapper.sql: SIGN_DATE, CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE, CREATED_USER, AREA_CODE, SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS, UPDATED_DATE, STATUS, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, WEBSITE, VALID_IND, CREATED_DATE, CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE, LEGAL, VALID_DATE, MEDIUM_ENAME, PROFESSION, LICENCE, UPDATED_USER, EXPIRE_DATE, CHANNEL_LEVEL, CITY_CODE, SALE_POLICY_NAME, SIMPLE_NAME, REGISTER_ADDRESS, COUNTRY, CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG, PARTER_LEVEL, HISTORY_ID, INNER_CODE, SUPPORT_FLAG, PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE, AGENT_CODE, PROCESS_USER_CODE, C_AGENTORG_CDE, C_UKEY_CDE

SIGN_DATE as "signDate", CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE as "channelExtendCode", CREATED_USER as "createdUser", AREA_CODE as "areaCode", SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS as "salePolicyAddress", UPDATED_DATE as "updatedDate", STATUS as "status", CHILD_DEPT_LOOK as "childDeptLook", WEBSITE as "website", VALID_IND as "validInd", CREATED_DATE as "createdDate", CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE as "channelOuterCode", LEGAL as "legal", VALID_DATE as "validDate", MEDIUM_ENAME as "mediumEname", PROFESSION as "profession", LICENCE as "licence", UPDATED_USER as "updatedUser", EXPIRE_DATE as "expireDate", CHANNEL_LEVEL as "channelLevel", CITY_CODE as "cityCode", SALE_POLICY_NAME as "salePolicyName", SIMPLE_NAME as "simpleName", REGISTER_ADDRESS as "registerAddress", COUNTRY as "country", CHANNEL_CODE as "channelCode", MEDIUM_CNAME as "mediumCname", FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG as "financePolicyFlag", PARTER_LEVEL as "parterLevel", HISTORY_ID as "historyId", INNER_CODE as "innerCode", SUPPORT_FLAG as "supportFlag", PROCESS_DEPT_CODE as "processDeptCode", PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE as "parentChannelCode", AGENT_CODE as "agentCode", PROCESS_USER_CODE as "processUserCode"
mapper.update:
update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE = #{channelExtendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS = #{salePolicyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE = #{channelOuterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL = #{legal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MEDIUM_ENAME = #{mediumEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=CHAR},
LICENCE = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_LEVEL = #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_POLICY_NAME = #{salePolicyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIMPLE_NAME = #{simpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_ADDRESS = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIUM_CNAME = #{mediumCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG = #{financePolicyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PARTER_LEVEL = #{parterLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
INNER_CODE = #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPORT_FLAG = #{supportFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = #{processDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = #{parentChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_USER_CODE = #{processUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where HISTORY_ID = #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY set SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE = #{channelExtendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS = #{salePolicyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR}, WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE = #{channelOuterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL = #{legal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MEDIUM_ENAME = #{mediumEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=CHAR}, LICENCE = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_LEVEL = #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_POLICY_NAME = #{salePolicyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIMPLE_NAME = #{simpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_ADDRESS = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIUM_CNAME = #{mediumCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG = #{financePolicyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, PARTER_LEVEL = #{parterLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, INNER_CODE = #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPORT_FLAG = #{supportFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = #{processDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = #{parentChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_USER_CODE = #{processUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where HISTORY_ID = #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY set SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE = #{channelExtendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS = #{salePolicyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR}, WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE = #{channelOuterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL = #{legal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MEDIUM_ENAME = #{mediumEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=CHAR}, LICENCE = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_LEVEL = #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_POLICY_NAME = #{salePolicyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIMPLE_NAME = #{simpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_ADDRESS = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIUM_CNAME = #{mediumCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG = #{financePolicyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, PARTER_LEVEL = #{parterLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, INNER_CODE = #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPORT_FLAG = #{supportFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = #{processDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = #{parentChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_USER_CODE = #{processUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where HISTORY_ID = #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN_HISTORY pb on pb.HISTORY_ID = cm.HISTORY_ID
and pb.VALID_IND = 1 and cm.VALID_IND = 1

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select pb.HISTORY_ID, pb.DEPT_CODE, dept.dept_simple_name, pb.CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, deptp.dept_simple_name PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, decode(pb.APPROVE_FLAG, '1', '已审核', '0', '未审核', '已审核') APPROVE_FLAG, pb.updated_user APPROVE_CODE, decode(pb.STATUS, '1', '正在代理', '') STATUS, cg.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY, bl.LINE_NAME BUSINESS_LINE, cm.UPDATED_DATE from CHANNEL_MAIN_HISTORY pb left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY cm on pb.History_Id = cm.History_Id and cm.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE and dept.VALID_IND = 1 left join BUSINESS_LINE bl on pb.BUSINESS_LINE = bl.LINE_CODE and bl.VALID_IND = 1 left join CATEGORY cg on pb.CATEGORY = cg.CATEGORY_CODE and cg.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT deptp on cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = deptp.DEPT_CODE and deptp.VALID_IND = 1 left join salesman sa on pb.APPROVE_CODE = sa.employ_code
and pb.VALID_IND = 1 group by pb.HISTORY_ID, pb.DEPT_CODE, dept.dept_simple_name, pb.CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, deptp.dept_simple_name, pb.APPROVE_FLAG, pb.updated_user, pb.STATUS, cg.CATEGORY_NAME, bl.LINE_NAME, cm.UPDATED_DATE order by cm.UPDATED_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select to_char(cm.SIGN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "SIGN_DATE",cm.CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE, cm.STATUS,cm.CHILD_DEPT_LOOK,cm.WEBSITE,cm.CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE,cm.LEGAL, to_char(cm.VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "VALID_DATE",cm.MEDIUM_ENAME, cm.PROFESSION,cm.LICENCE,to_char(cm.EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "EXPIRE_DATE", cm.CHANNEL_LEVEL,cm.CITY_CODE,cm.SALE_POLICY_NAME,cm.SIMPLE_NAME, cm.REGISTER_ADDRESS,cm.COUNTRY,cm.CHANNEL_CODE,cm.PARTER_LEVEL,cm.MEDIUM_CNAME, cm.FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG,cm.INNER_CODE,cm.SUPPORT_FLAG, cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE || '-' || deptp.dept_simple_name PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, cm.AGENT_CODE,cm.PROCESS_USER_CODE, BANK_NODE,BANK_ACCOUNT,REMARK,CHANNEL_CATEGORY,MISTAKE_CONTENT,pb.TEL,BANK_PROVINCE, BANK_RECEIVE,FINANCE_FLAG,CHANNEL_PROPERTY,pb.DEPT_CODE,OFFICE_ADDRESS,BANK_NAME, CONTACT,BUSINESS_LINE,CHANNEL_FEATURE,BANK_CITY,MISTAKE_FLAG,CHANNEL_TYPE,CHANNEL_OWN_TYPE, CHANNEL_FLAG,CHANNEL_RATE,pb.DEPT_CODE || '-' || dept.dept_simple_name dept_simple_name, cm.PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE || '-' || cn.MEDIUM_CNAME PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE, cm.C_AGENTORG_CDE,cm.C_UKEY_CDE from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN_HISTORY pb on pb.History_Id = cm.History_Id and pb.VALID_IND = 1 left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cn on cm.PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = cn.CHANNEL_CODE and cn.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE and dept.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT deptp on cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = deptp.DEPT_CODE and deptp.VALID_IND = 1 where cm.HISTORY_ID = #{historyId} and cm.VALID_IND = 1

when.test: endpoint!=null and endpoint != '' and startpoint != null and startpoint != ''

mapper.insert: insert into channel_medium_detail_history ( ) select SIGN_DATE, CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE, SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS, sysdate, STATUS, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, WEBSITE, VALID_IND, sysdate, CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE, LEGAL, VALID_DATE, MEDIUM_ENAME, PROFESSION, LICENCE, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE, CHANNEL_LEVEL, CITY_CODE, SALE_POLICY_NAME, SIMPLE_NAME, REGISTER_ADDRESS, COUNTRY, CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG, PARTER_LEVEL, #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INNER_CODE, SUPPORT_FLAG, PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE, AGENT_CODE, PROCESS_USER_CODE, C_AGENTORG_CDE, C_UKEY_CDE from channel_medium_detail cmd where cmd.channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cmd.valid_ind = '1'
